footer_html: Here's to two more!  ...and then more after that!

script.text: Who's next?
I think it's Cayenne. I'll go get him.
Wait.
What?
He's like, 2.
So what?
He's not gonna be able to understand anything!
I'll just get him from later on then.
Incoming!
What the fuck?!
Welcome, Cayenne, to the Booth of Mystery!
Who the hell are you? Where the hell am I?
The Booth of Mystery!
Put me back! Right now!
In a minute. I need to tell you your fortune first.
I don't want to hear that bullshit. Put me back!
Come on. Cooperate and she'll give you a coupon for free ice cream or some garbage.
Whatever. Hurry it up.
You know, your attitude kinda ruined the atmosphere we were going for.
I don't care.
Just tell him and get it over with!
Palm, please.
What?
I'm going to read your palm.
There's nothing written on it.
Do you want the coupon or not?
I see dark times ahead for you, Cayenne. Dark times, indeed.
Every day is dark like, half the time.
I see... your sister, stealing from you.
I'm shock—
I see... you, with something that once belonged to your sister. Yes! Your sister is totally jealous, because you have something that was once hers.
You will use it to become the blacksmith you've always thought you could be.
All I gotta do is take something from her? I'm all ears.
She didn't say that! Pay attention! And nice pun.
...wait, what?!
Ahem.
This future will only come to pass if you do not follow in your sister's footsteps, no matter how tempting it may be.
Well, I hate her and everything she does, so no problem there.
Can I go now?
Fine. Here's your coupon.
All right! I'm outta here.
Wait. This is buy one get one free! That's the shittiest kind of free!
Next!
Incoming!
Goddamnit! That's disgusting! You got her too early!
Whatever. Hold on.
Hey, sorry about that. He screwed it up and got you when you were, uh...
Intensive surgery. Lots of transplants for one patient.
Well, hey, they lived, right? No harm done!
Is this a habit of yours? Kidnapping surgeons? Who even are you?
I am your fortune teller, and this is the Booth of Mystery.
I see. And why am I here?
Someone paid for you to get your fortune told from us!
Should I believe that?
I don't care! Just get your fortune and be happy with it!
It's a happy one, then? I think that's all I need to hear.
No, that's not all there is to it. It's about your cruise. The one you've always wanted to go on.
The one no one knows about but me?
And me. And him. And the other doctor.
It's just Medi—
I know, not a doctor. Whatever.
Ah jeez, how can I word this without spoiling everything for you? Hmm.
Tell her she'll find everything she's ever hoped to find during the cruise!
That's not accurate at all!
It totally is! She'll totally appreciate it afterward!
Fine!
You'll find everything you ever hoped to find during the cruise.
Is that a good thing? You do know what I do, right?
I never said it was good or not.
That's true.
Well, I'll be off.
Give her the voucher!
Sigh. Here.
Hm. It's been quite some time while since I've had ice cream.
Thanks!
Next!
Next! Where is he?
Pull the rope!
I don't have to! He's walking here! Give him like a minute.
Hello? Is this...
Madam Azlyn's Booth of Mystery?
Y...es.
Welcome, Biff, to my... Azlyn's Booth of Mystery.
Rad! How do we get started?
Palm, please.
Let's do Tarot instead.
I sense you are here because your soul feels weary. Lost. You are searching for something.
That's what it feels like. Except I don't know what it is I'm searching for.
You need some guidance. The tarot will point you in the right direction.
Hell yes. I shoulda done this months ago.
Pick a card.
Aren't you supposed to deal them?
That would take too long. Just pick a card.
Sure.
Not that one.
This one?
That's a good one.
Well, it was nice knowing me.
That's not what Death means! It means—
No! Let me tell him! You don't make it mysterious at all!
Whatever!
The tarot tells me... it is time for a new chapter of your life. You must close the old chapter, and do not despair over it.
What do you mean?
Leave your past behind, and live for the future. Do the things you've always wanted to do. That is all.
And take this card with you. It will serve as your spirit talisman.
Awesome. I actually feel better already. I kinda knew I had to go off on my own, but it was nice to hear someone else say it.
Cool.
Thanks!
Next!
Well, this is new. I'm still in the marketplace, at least. I think.
Ugh...
You got the wrong one!
Aw, shit!
I told you this would happen!
I forgot!
Sorry. We kinda missed.
I understand. You should have seen this one witch I talked to earlier. She was brand new, and—
No no! Don't say it!
Huh?
Uh, do you want your fortune or anything?
That's not what I came here for. I'll pass.
Hmm.
We have to give her something! Do we have any vouchers?
We're out!
Vouchers for what?
Free ice cream. But we already gave the last one away.
Got any books instead?
Oh! That's it!
You already have the books you'll need.
That's it?
Tell her she already has the books she'll need!
I already did that!
Who were you aiming for anyway?
Someone else. But they, uh, well, it doesn't really matter. They already got a fortune, anyway.
Uh huh. All right. Well, seeya.
Next!
Welco—
Oh. It's you again.
It's me!
Whatever. Welcome to the Booth of Mystery.
Wow! The real mystery is how you're getting away with this awful aesthetic!
What?!
How do I look, by the way? Don't be afraid to tell me!
You're fine.
Fine? Or... fi...antastic?
I don't think I'm gonna tell you your fortune, after hearing that.
Joke's on you! You bringing me here tells me everything I need to know!
You can send me back now. I must practice for my countless admirers!
Ugh.
